mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, password, status FROM sys_user WHERE user_name = #{userName}
SELECT id, user_name, name, password, dept_id, email, mobile, sex, birth, pic_id, address, province, city, district, status FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( user_name, name, password, dept_id, email, mobile, sex, birth, pic_id, address, province, city, district, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{name}, #{password}, #{deptId}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{picId}, #{address}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{status}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
